resources.string: No password or password is too short.
No text entered or in clipboard.

Enter your text which should be en- or decrypted in the upper field, then enter the password in the bottom field (min. 8 letters) and touch the appropriate button.
If there is no text in the textfield, the clipboard content will be used.

The app uses a simple but effective implementation of Blowfish. But even the safest encryption algorithm is useless if the password gets in the wrong hands or is not changed frequently!
